Somerville.Joseph Lovering House:
The Joseph Lovering House is an historic house located at 38 Kirkland Street in Cambridge, Massachusetts.


== Description ==
The 2.5 story Greek Revival wood frame house was built in 1839 by Oliver Hastings, a high-profile local builder (whose own mansion is now a National Historic Landmark), in conjunction with Luther Brooks, owner of the next-door house. It was purchased in 1843 by Joseph Lovering, a math professor at Harvard University, and remained in his family until 1941.
